participant_1.background:
I'm not sure if it's the hardest thing I've ever done, but it was really difficult for me to say goodbye to my dog when he died.
i would like to retire to hawaii in the next 10 years.
I have kids, and we enjoy spending time together.
I have always loved roses so the first thing I remember buying was a rose bush for my garden.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I ate pancakes with extra syrup and bacon for my birthday breakfast.
i hate popcorn.
My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.
I spend my free time working on cars and watching baseball.
i work 9 to 5 job.

content.text: Good morning! How are you today?
I'm doing pretty well! I had pancakes with extra syrup and bacon for breakfast this morning. How about you?
Oh my! That sounds delicious! I had cereal with bananas and almond milk. I'm trying to eat healthier.
That sounds good too! I wish I was eating healthier.
It's not too hard! You just have to make small changes.
I know, I know. I'll get there eventually.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my kids. We like to go to the park, play games, and read books. I also love gardening, cooking, and working out.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love gardening too. What's your favorite flower?
I love roses! They're so beautiful and fragrant.
Roses are beautiful! I've never really had any luck growing them.
You should give them a try! They're not as hard to grow as you might think.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! I'm always happy to talk about gardening.
